results.best_rules:
initiatedAt(leaving_object(P,Obj)=true, T) :-
    happensAt(appear(Obj), T),
    holdsAt(person(P)=true, T),
    holdsAt(close(P, Obj, LeavingObjectThr)=true, T),
    thresholds(leavingObject, LeavingObjectThr).

terminatedAt(leaving_object(P,Obj)=true, T) :-
    happensAt(disappear(Obj), T).

holdsFor(moving(P1, P2) = true, I) :-
    holdsFor(walking(P1) = true, I1),
    holdsFor(walking(P2) = true, I2),
    holdsFor(close(P1, P2, DistanceThreshold) = true, I3),
    thresholds(moving, DistanceThreshold),
    intersect_all([I1, I2, I3], I).

holdsFor(fighting(P1, P2)=true, FightingI) :-
    thresholds(fighting, FightingThreshold),
    holdsFor(close(P1, P2, FightingThreshold)=true, CloseI),
    holdsFor(abrupt(P1)=true, AbruptP1I),
    holdsFor(abrupt(P2)=true, AbruptP2I),
    holdsFor(inactive(P1)=true, InactiveP1I),
    holdsFor(inactive(P2)=true, InactiveP2I),
    union_all([AbruptP1I, AbruptP2I], AbruptI),
    union_all([InactiveP1I, InactiveP2I], InactiveI),
    intersect_all([CloseI, AbruptI], AbruptCloseI),
    relative_complement_all(AbruptCloseI, [InactiveI], FightingI).
